title: HELPPPPPPPPPPPPP
body:
HELP PLZ
WHEN I LAUNCH MY CLIENT, it says bugsplat.dll is missing

replies.body:
Ah, this annoying bug hasn't popped up in a while! This typically shows up if something went wrong during the installation or patching process, so you should be able to resolve this fairly easily. I'd recommend grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run the *Force Repatch* function by checking the box next to it before hitting the **START** button.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
